alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 7:20AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 745 AM MST... At 720 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Estrella Sailport, or 25 miles southwest of Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Estrella, Estrella Sailport, Sonoran National Monument, Mobile and Ak-Chin Village. This includes AZ Route 238 between mile markers 11 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
